data_table.description: Derived Variables, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ASPIRINCODE21
variable.description: Used aspirin-containing analgesics (at visit 2) in last 2 weeks (0=no, 1=yes), based on 2004 Med. code [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: STATINCODE21
variable.description: Used statin (at visit 2) last 2weeks (0=no, 1=yes) based on 2004 Med. code [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: ANTICOAGCODE21
variable.description: Used anticoagulants (at visit 2) last 2 weeks (0=no, 1=yes) based on 2004 Med. code [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: LVHSCR21
variable.description: Cornell voltage in UV (S In V3+r In AVL) [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: NLVHSC21
variable.description: Cornell voltage in mm [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: CLVH21
variable.description: LVH present by Cornell definition [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: MDDXMI21
variable.description: Visit 2, MD diagnosed myocardial infarction [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: HXOFMI21
variable.description: Visit 2, history of myocardial infarction [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: PRVCHD21
variable.description: Visit 2, prevalent coronary heart disease [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: PRVCHD22
variable.description: Visit 2, prevalent coronary heart disease [CHD], unverified [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: QWAVE24A
variable.description: Diagnostic Q-wave present from adjudicated data [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: QWAVE27A
variable.description: Major Q-wave present with no 7-1-1, 7-1-2, or 7-4, from original machine coded ECG records [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: QWAVE28B
variable.description: Minor Q-wave present with ST or T codes and no 7-1-1, 7-1-2, or 7-4 codes from adjudicated ECG records [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: ECGMI24
variable.description: Prevalent myocardial infarction from adjudicated ECG [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: QWVEM28B
variable.description: Same as QWAVE28b but uses machine code [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: MACHMI22
variable.description: Previous myocardial infarction from machine coded [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: V2AGE22
variable.description: Age at visit 2 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: CURSMK21
variable.description: Current smoker flag [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: FORSMK21
variable.description: Former smoker flag [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: EVRSMK21
variable.description: Ever smoker flag [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: CURDRK21
variable.description: Current drinker flag [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: FORDRK21
variable.description: Former drinker flag [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: EVRDRK21
variable.description: Ever drinker flag [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: TGLEFH21
variable.description: Triglycerides under 400 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: DIABTS22
variable.description: Visit 2, diabetes [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: DIABTS23
variable.description: Diabetes - lower cut point 126 [mg/dL] [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: RACEGRP
variable.description: Race (from FTRA23) [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: GENDER
variable.description: Sex (from FTRA22) [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: QWAVEM27
variable.description: Same as QWAVE27a but uses machine code [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: COMPLET2
variable.description: Visit 2, completion indicator [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: BMI21
variable.description: Visit 2, Body Mass Index in kg/m2 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: MNTRCP21
variable.description: Visit 2, mean triceps in mm [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: MNSSCP21
variable.description: Visit 2, mean subscapular in mm [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: WSTHPR21
variable.description: Visit 2, waist-hip ratio [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: LDL22
variable.description: Visit 2, re-calculated LDL-C in mg/dL [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: HDL221
variable.description: Visit 2, HDL (2) cholesterol in mg/dL [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: GLUSIU21
variable.description: Visit 2, blood glucose in mmol/L [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: TCHSIU21
variable.description: Visit 2, total cholesterol in Mmol/L [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: HDLSIU21
variable.description: Visit 2, HDL cholesterol in mmol/L [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: HD2SIU21
variable.description: Visit 2, HDL (2) cholesterol in mmol/L [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: HD3SIU21
variable.description: Visit 2, HDL (3) cholesterol in mmol/L [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: APASIU21
variable.description: Visit 2, apolipoprotein Ai in mg/L [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: APBSIU21
variable.description: Visit 2, apolipoprotein B in mg/L [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: LDLSIU22
variable.description: Visit 2, LDL cholesterol in mmol/L [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: TRGSIU21
variable.description: Visit 2, total triglycerides in Mmol/L [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: HYPERT24
variable.description: Visit 2, hypertension, definition 4 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: HYPERT25
variable.description: Visit 2, hypertension, definition 5 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: HYPERT26
variable.description: Visit 2, hypertension, definition 6 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: CIGT21
variable.description: Visit 2, cigarette smoking status [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: DRNKR21
variable.description: Visit 2, drinking status [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: ETHANL24
variable.description: Visit 2, usual ethanol intake in g/week [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: HYPTMD21
variable.description: Hypertension Meds (self reported) [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: MENOPS21
variable.description: Menopause status variable for visit 2 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: HORMON22
variable.description: Visit 2, hormone use [Cohort, Exam 2]
variable.value: Former Hormone User or Former User of other medications reported by participants as hormones

variable.name: BIFSHD21
variable.description: Shadowing in either carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: INTSHD21
variable.description: Shadowing in either internal carotid [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: COMSHD21
variable.description: Shadowing in either common carotid [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: BIFPLQ21
variable.description: Plaque in either carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: INTPLQ21
variable.description: Plaque in either internal carotid [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: COMPLQ21
variable.description: Plaque in either common carotid [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: LCOMPS21
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in the left common [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: RCOMPS21
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in the right common [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: LBIFPS21
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in left bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: RBIFPS21
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in right bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: RINTPS21
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in the right internal [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: LINTPS21
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in the left internal [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: COMPS21
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in either common [Cohort, Exam 2]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (on either side)

variable.name: BIFPS21
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in either bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 2]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (on either side)

variable.name: INTPS21
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in either internal [Cohort, Exam 2]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (on either side)

variable.name: LPLQSD21
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in any left site [Cohort, Exam 2]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (at both sites)

variable.name: RPLQSD21
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in any right site [Cohort, Exam 2]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (at both sites)

variable.name: PLQSHD21
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in any site [Cohort, Exam 2]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (at both sites)

variable.name: PLAQUE21
variable.description: Plaque (with or without shadowing) [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: PLAQUE23
variable.description: Plaque(with and W/O shadowing)-Alt. Def. [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: FAST0823
variable.description: Visit 2, fast 8 hrs. or more, definition 2 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: FAST1223
variable.description: Visit 2, fast 12 hrs. or more, definition 2 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: PRVCHD23
variable.description: Prevalent coronary heart disease [CHD] at visit 2, definition 3 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: PRVSTR21
variable.description: Prevalent stroke at visit 2 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: HYPTMDCODE21
variable.description: Hypertension lowering medication within past 2 weeks (visit 2) [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: CHDRISK10YR_21
variable.description: 10 year incident risk score for coronary heart disease [CHD] at visit 2 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: STROKERISK10YR_21
variable.description: Predicted 10 year risk of incident ischemic stroke (visit 2) [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: DIABETESRISK9YR_21
variable.description: Predicted 9 year risk of incident type two diabetes [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: CHOLMDCODE21
variable.description: Cholesterol lowering medication W/in 2 wks.: using 2004 Med. code, visit 2 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: CHOLMDCODE22
variable.description: Medications which secondarily affect cholesterol: using 2004 Med. Code, visit 2 [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: CENTERID
variable.description: Recoded Center ID [Cohort, Exam 2]

variable.name: V2DAYS
variable.description: Days since exam 1 [Cohort, Exam 2]
